scienceworldreport.com/2015/04/how-milli.title: How Millimeter-Sized Stones in Space Formed Our Planet (VIDEO)...
scienceworldreport.com/2015/04/how-milli.snippet: Scientists may have found out not only how asteroids formed, but also how our planet was created. They've discovered that a cosmic ocean of millimeter-sized particles that orbited the young sun were the building blocks that helped form our planet.
